abstract: BHP Billiton said Friday that it expected to file a challenge within the day to Potash Corporation of Saskachewan’s lawsuit trying to block its $39 billion hostile offer.
snippet: BHP Billiton said Friday that it expected to file a challenge within the day to Potash Corporation of Saskachewan’s lawsuit trying to block its $39 billion hostile offer.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton said Friday that it expected to file a challenge to Potash Corporation of Saskachewan’s lawsuit trying to block its $39 billion hostile offer.

headline.main: BHP Poised to Challenge Potash Suit
